attributes.additional_details: in the daily mail it ran a story about a immagrint family who was given a £2 million london house to live in , they recieved this because of the large family , 6 children , 2 adults , they was offered a house of the same size in coventry were they are from orignally ,and that was in a well to do area of coventry , i feel the goverment needs to look at this loophole and shut it so all families have the right to live were they want not just one with lots of children , the fact that the parents in this family cannot speak english , but they can choose one of the best houses and areas in london to live in , i want the goverment to close this loophole ,
